website.name: Shibuya Digital Hub
website.description: Dense information portal featuring technology news, reviews, tutorials, and community discussions with maximum content visibility per screen

theme.name: Dense Japanese Web
theme.aesthetic: Information-dense Japanese portal style with compact layouts, sidebar widgets, and maximum content per viewport
theme.targetAudience: Tech enthusiasts, developers, digital natives who prefer high information density
theme.designPrinciples: Maximize content-to-pixel ratio, efficient space usage, hierarchical information architecture, compact visual elements
theme.gradientStyle: Subtle gradients on backgrounds and cards to create depth without wasting space

pages.name: Homepage
pages.layout: Dense 3-column layout with main content, sidebar widgets, and secondary sidebar for ads/links

sections.name: Compact Header
sections.content: Minimal height header with logo, horizontal nav menu, search bar, user account dropdown, and language toggle. Height: 60px max

sections.name: Breaking News Ticker
sections.content: Horizontal scrolling news ticker with latest tech updates, 30px height, auto-scrolling with pause on hover

sections.name: Featured Articles Grid
sections.content: 3x2 grid of featured articles with thumbnails, headlines, author, date, and excerpt. Compact card design with minimal padding

sections.name: Live Activity Feed
sections.content: Real-time feed of user comments, new posts, trending topics. Compact list format with avatars, timestamps, and interaction counts

sections.name: Technology Categories
sections.content: Dense 4x3 grid of technology categories with icons, article counts, and trending indicators. AI, Web Dev, Mobile, Gaming, Hardware, etc.

sections.name: Trending Tools Widget
sections.content: Compact list of trending development tools, frameworks, and services with ratings and quick stats

sections.name: Code Snippets Sidebar
sections.content: Rotating code snippets with syntax highlighting, copy button, and language tags. Updated daily

sections.name: Community Stats
sections.content: Live statistics: active users, daily posts, total articles, trending hashtags. Compact dashboard style

sections.name: Quick Links Menu
sections.content: Dense vertical menu with icons: Documentation, Tutorials, Downloads, API Reference, GitHub Repos, Discord

sections.name: Recent Reviews
sections.content: Compact list of latest tech product reviews with star ratings, summary, and reviewer info. 5-6 items visible

sections.name: Event Calendar Widget
sections.content: Mini calendar showing upcoming tech events, webinars, and conferences. Clickable dates with event previews

sections.name: Job Board Ticker
sections.content: Horizontal scrolling job listings from top tech companies. Company logo, position, location, salary range

sections.name: Footer Sitemap
sections.content: Dense 5-column footer with complete sitemap, social links, newsletter signup, and company info. Maximum link density

pages.name: Articles
pages.layout: Article list with filtering sidebar, pagination, and related content recommendations

sections.name: Article List
sections.content: Dense grid of articles with thumbnails, titles, excerpts, tags, author info, and engagement metrics

sections.name: Filter Sidebar
sections.content: Compact filtering options: categories, tags, date range, author, difficulty level, reading time

pages.name: Community
pages.layout: Forum-style layout with discussion threads, user profiles, and activity feeds

sections.name: Discussion Threads
sections.content: Dense list of discussion threads with reply counts, last activity, user avatars, and vote scores

sections.name: User Leaderboard
sections.content: Top contributors ranked by karma, posts, helpful answers, and community involvement

layouts.layoutStyle: Dense Japanese portal style with minimal whitespace, compact widgets, and maximum content visibility per screen
layouts.navigationStyle: Horizontal main nav with dropdown menus, breadcrumb navigation, and sticky sidebar navigation for deep content
layouts.extra: Implement sticky headers, collapsible sidebar widgets, infinite scroll for feeds, and responsive breakpoints that maintain content density on mobile

templateInfo.description: Japanese-style information portal template optimized for maximum content-to-pixel ratio with compact layouts, sidebar widgets, and efficient space utilization
